message: People who doesn't even know where Venezuela is should abstain from comments... Venezuela is not rich, it might have tons of oil but instead of that being a good thing, it's a curse... And yes socialism sucks, does not work. About this article, is really sad that some people have to go through this situation with their pets, but shame on for posting this while a lot of things are happening that need international coverage so people really know what's going on there. And yes I'm one of the Venezuelans taking jobs away from Americans and making rent prices go up...
